subtitle: A Fondue is a splendid dish for a party but this is an Italian version that is equally as good. It can be served in small heated dishes or in the traditional manner in the fondue pot.

method.text: Put the cheese and half the milk into a pan. Heat very gently for 5 min until the cheese has melted.
Blend the rest of the milk with the egg yolks. Strain into the cheese mixture. Cook gently for 3-5 min or until thickened and creamy. Gradually stir in the butter. Season to taste.
Keep hot over a fondue heater or transfer to individual warmed soup bowls.

title: Fonduta
